name: Laura's parkour lesson
description:
This is my first ever Unity game which is only took me 2 days to make. It's a very simple parkour style game. I know that it might be a very short game but I hope you guys enjoy it.  You guys can mod this game if you want to but make sure you give a credit to the me as well for the game.

Credits:

Paulor94 - Game creator

MrDrNose and mystman12 - The owner of some textures and sounds

Inspired from: Baldi's obstacle course made by Modls
